abstract: Christopher Clarey On Track and Field column argues officials who organized winning bid for Eugene, Ore, to host 2021 world track and field championships should consider reopening bidding process, after series of corruption scandals discredited International Association of Athletics Federation.
lead_paragraph: Handing back the right to host the 2021 world track and field championships would be a strong signal that track and field is truly serious about embarking on a more transparent path.

headline.main: Plea for Global Good: Rebid on 2021 Worlds
headline.print_headline: Plea for Global Good: Rebid on 2021 Worlds

snippet: Handing back the right to host the 2021 world track and field championships would be a strong signal that track and field is truly serious about embarking on a more transparent path.
